title: One Piece – Episode 279 to an undeterminable episode…
author: animemiz
description: Contemporary blog post from 2006 discussing Episode 279 and the start of the recap filler arc. The author expresses disappointment with the filler episodes interrupting the Enies Lobby arc but acknowledges the need for the manga to advance.

title: One Piece Episode 279 / Chopperman Discussion
author: Multiple Users
description: Fan forum discussion thread about Episode 279, with particular focus on the Chopper Man omake segment. Users discuss whether to skip the recap episodes and share opinions on the Chopper Man parody.

title: Should i skip these episodes? 279-283
author: Multiple Users
description: Forum discussion where fans debate whether episodes 279-283 are worth watching. The consensus is that these recap episodes can be skipped as they only rehash previously shown content from earlier arcs.

title: One Piece: 10 Worst Filler Episodes, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Article ranking the worst filler episodes in One Piece. Episodes 279-283 are mentioned as particularly frustrating recaps that interrupt the Enies Lobby arc at a critical moment.

title: One Piece - Taki ni Mukatte Tobe!! Luffy no Omoi!! (TV Episode 2006)
author: IMDb Users
description: IMDb entry for Episode 279 with a rating of 6.2/10. Includes user reviews describing it as a nostalgic filler about Luffy's past that is skippable but worth watching for emotional context.

title: Shanks Loses His Left Arms To Save Luffy From Sea King - One Piece Sad Moments
author: Loves Anime
description: Video clip showing the iconic scene of Shanks sacrificing his arm to save young Luffy from the Lord of the Coast, which is featured in the Episode 279 flashback.

title: One Piece Filler List
author: Anime Filler List
description: Comprehensive filler guide for One Piece that lists Episode 279 as filler. Helpful resource for fans deciding which episodes to skip during their watch-through.
